          <title>
            <string language="sl">Programiranje</string>
            <string language="en">Programming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγραμματισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Programación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o programiranju v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: program, algoritem, programski jezik, razhroščevanje, dokumentiranje programov</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about programming, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: program, algorithm, programming language, debugging, documenting program</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">programiranje</string>
            <string language="en">programming (informatics)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razhroščevanje</string>
            <string language="en">debugging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">programski jezik</string>
            <string language="en">programming language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">algoritem</string>
            <string language="en">algorithm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dokumentacija</string>
            <string language="en">documentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über die Programmierung, Teil Ematerialien
für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: Programm, 
Algorithmus, Programmiersprache, prüfend aus und dokumentieren 
Programm</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de la programmation, partie 
d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. Contenu de 
chapitre : programme, algorithme, langage de programmation, 
mettant au point, documentant le programme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a programação, parte dos 
e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices do 
capítulo: programa, algoritmo, língua de programação, 
eliminando erros, documentando o programa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa la programmazione facente parte i 
e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare di 
capitolo: programma, procedura, linguaggio di programmazione, 
mettendo a punto, documentando programma</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τον προγραμματισμό, μέρος των ε-υλικών 
για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. Περιεχόμενο 
κεφαλαίου: πρόγραμμα, αλγόριθμος, γλώσσα προγραμματισμού, 
προγραμματιστικό λάθος, που τεκμηριώνει το πρόγραμμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre la programación, parte de los 
e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido del 
capítulo: programa, algoritmo, lenguaje de programación, 
poniendo a punto, documentando programa</string>
          </description>
